main event: Members of the St. Mary Ranger Station observed a glowing circular object in the sky for about 2 minutes on May 23, 1965.
interesting points: The object was circular and estimated to be 20-30 feet in diameter,The object appeared to hover and maneuver in the sky,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes,No sound was associated with the object,The object accelerated and disappeared from sight.
witness description: members of the St. Mary Ranger Station
